Text: Re Part issues Cc This email is confidential and may also be privileged Please notify us immediately if you are not the intended recipient You should not copy it forward it or use it for any purpose or disclose the contents to any person Dear Justin As promised you will find attached our views on the basic questions you posed about Part issues in your email of September As I say in the attached paper we will provide a followup paper on the more complex issues in your September email and related questions I am also emailing copies to Mark Taylor and Ken Raisler Tomorrow I will send you hard copies with the Appendices I refer to in the text of the attached Please give me a call when you have had a chance to look this over All the best Ned Simmons Simmons Wilson Street London ECM TX Tel Fax DX LondonChancery Ln An international law firm London Paris Brussels Lisbon Milan Rome Abu Dhabi Hong Kong Shanghai New York A list of partners at each office can be provided on request wwwsimmonssimmonscom wwwelexicacom is the award winning interactive online legal resource by lawyers for lawyers powered by content from Simmons Simmons FFC Marketing of Futures and Options in the USdoc

Re LME Contracts Cc Thank you I have your questions I will get back to you ASAP All the best Ned pm Ken Ned Thank you both for your written advice concerning the marketing of LME registered contracts I would be grateful if you could both answer the following additional questions Can Enron Metals Ltd market LME Contracts to the or so existing US customers of MG London Incas well as of course new US customers So far as marketing by Enron Metals Ltd is concerned do all written marketing materials eg letters faxes brochures fliers and mailshots need explicitly to be sent in the name of Enron Metals Ltd Alternatively is it possible for such materials to be sent under the cover of EnronOnline but with a footer appearing on such materials referring to Enron Metals Ltd egEnron Metals Ltd is SFA registered In the context again of marketing by Enron Metals Ltd and I have assumed your answer will be in the negative would any group relief be available given that Enron Metals Ltd is part of the Enron group of companies of which EnronOnline forms part Although I am sure you have already confirmed this can you once again confirm that Enron Metals Ltd is free to market LME contracts to new US whether MG London Inc do so as well In terms of marketing activities conducted by telephone or fax with US customers I assume that this may only be carried out only by employees of Enron Metals Ltd or MG London Inc as applicable Thanks Justin

Answers to Additional Part Questions Cc This email is confidential and may also be privileged Please notify us immediately if you are not the intended recipient You should not copy it forward it or use it for any purpose or disclose the contents to any person Dear Justin As discussed please find attached our paper providing answers to the additional questions on LME contract marketing posed by your email of September If you have any other questions please contact me We will now proceed to complete our comments on your initial inquiries as indicated in the conclusion of our September paper All the best Ned Simmons Simmons Wilson Street London ECM TX Tel Fax DX LondonChancery Ln An international law firm London Paris Brussels Lisbon Milan Rome Abu Dhabi Hong Kong Shanghai New York A list of partners at each office can be provided on request wwwsimmonssimmonscom wwwelexicacom is the award winning interactive online legal resource by lawyers for lawyers powered by content from Simmons Simmons EA Enron Metals Part Memo Cdoc

Attention Yvette Christmannote This email is confidential and may also be privileged Please notify us immediately if you are not the intended recipient You should not copy it forward it or use it for any purpose or disclose the contents to any person Dear Ms Christman Please find attached a letter explaining the name change of Metallgesellschaft Limited NFA ID to Enron Metals Limited which I have previously discussed with you by telephone I will also post a copy of the attached letter to you Thank you very much for your courtesy and help Sincerely yours Ned Swan Simmons Simmons London Tel Simmons Simmons Wilson Street London ECM TX Tel Fax DX LondonChancery Ln An international law firm London Paris Brussels Lisbon Milan Rome Abu Dhabi Hong Kong Shanghai New York A list of partners at each office can be provided on request wwwsimmonssimmonscom wwwelexicacom is the award winning interactive online legal resource by lawyers for lawyers powered by content from Simmons Simmons LTR Yvonne Christman for ENS Oct sodoc
